author: fhanik
msg: Implement asynchronous callbacks for CometEvent.close and CometEvent.setTimeout to avoid connections with very long timeouts getting stuck
CometProcessor implements servlet interface, or the code will fail deployment
if no keepalive, close the connection after comet transaction is complete

author: damitha
msg: Avoid setting create sequences messages operation twice

msg: Add doPriv's around file.exists() and file.isdir()
